div.head: 大便更澀
div.div: major relief changed to roughness; defecation changed to roughness

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major relief changed to roughness; defecation changed to roughness

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with bian nan 便難 , difficult defecation. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu lian 木 蓮 quoting Yang shi jia cang fang 楊氏家藏方 : 大便急澀 , “Defecation is urgent and rough”, writes: 大便更 澀 , “ Defecation has changed to roughness ”, possibly a misreading of the character 急 as 更 .
